description.raw:
There is a [qt4 bug](https://bugreports.qt-project.org/browse/QTBUG-22829) that causes build failures when some boost header files are present in a moc invocation. This was previously fixed in pull request #14, but boost 1.57 has re-broken this, such that [gazebo fails to build](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/issue/1399/build-fails-with-boost-157). Note that boost 1.57 is the current default version on mac homebrew.

To be safe, I've added all boost header files from Param.hh to the `#ifndef` block, which has fixed the build issues in my testing.

I will make a companion pull request to gazebo, since there are other required changes there.
